statements: SELECT * FROM error_alert_messages;
SELECT message FROM error_alert_messages WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM error_alert_messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, message FROM error_alert_messages WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT message FROM error_alert_messages WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-06-30 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM error_alert_messages WHERE timestamp > NOW() ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT message, timestamp FROM error_alert_messages WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001'
SELECT id, message FROM error_alert_messages WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM error_alert_messages WHERE message LIKE '%error%'
SELECT id, timestamp FROM error_alert_messages WHERE id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001', '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002')
SELECT * FROM ErrorMessages;
SELECT error_id, error_message FROM ErrorMessages WHERE error_id = 1;
SELECT alert_message, alert_level FROM AlertMessages ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM AlertMessages WHERE alert_level > 2;
SELECT error_id, error_message, error_timestamp FROM ErrorMessages ORDER BY error_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM ErrorMessages ORDER BY error_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT error_message, error_timestamp FROM ErrorMessages WHERE error_id = 3
SELECT error_message, alert_message FROM ErrorMessages JOIN AlertMessages ON ErrorMessages.error_id = AlertMessages.alert_id
SELECT DISTINCT error_message FROM ErrorMessages
SELECT error_message, alert_level FROM ErrorMessages, AlertMessages WHERE ErrorMessages.error_id = 1 AND AlertMessages.alert_level > 2
SELECT * FROM vpn_alerts WHERE severity = 1;
SELECT id, error_message, timestamp FROM vpn_errors ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT alert_message, severity FROM vpn_alerts WHERE severity >= 2;
SELECT log_message, source_ip, destination_ip FROM vpn_logs WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT id, timestamp FROM vpn_errors WHERE error_message LIKE '%connection%';
SELECT * FROM vpn_errors WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT alert_message, severity FROM vpn_alerts WHERE severity >= 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT log_message, source_ip, destination_ip FROM vpn_logs WHERE source_ip LIKE '192.168.%' AND destination_ip = '10.0.0.1' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, error_message FROM vpn_errors WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM vpn_logs WHERE source_ip = '10.1.1.1' AND destination_ip = '10.2.2.2' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM errors;
SELECT id, message, timestamp FROM alerts WHERE level = 'error';
SELECT id, name, location FROM vpn_services ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE last_login >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, message, level FROM alerts WHERE vpn_service_id = 3 AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM errors WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT message, timestamp FROM errors WHERE vpn_service_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, message, timestamp FROM errors WHERE message LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, message, timestamp FROM errors WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM alerts JOIN vpn_services ON alerts.vpn_service_id = vpn_services.id WHERE alerts.level = 'Critical' ORDER BY alerts.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM error_logs;
SELECT id, error_message, timestamp FROM error_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM vpn_users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM vpn_connections WHERE connection_status = 'ACTIVE';
SELECT server_id, server_name, location FROM vpn_servers ORDER BY server_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM error_logs WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, error_message FROM error_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT alert_message, timestamp FROM alert_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM vpn_users WHERE username LIKE 'john%';
SELECT server_name, location FROM vpn_servers WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY server_name ASC;
